detail_desc: Wide belt with a round metal buckle.
Ribbed vest top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a lace trim around the neckline and armholes and an overlocked hem.

Short dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a wide drawstring neckline and long raglan sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Short jersey dress with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, frills down the front that continue back over the shoulders, and buttons at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Lined.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing with a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped key pocket at the back and reflective details.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed slub cotton jersey.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in stretch denim with a high waist and zip fly with a button.
Tube top in soft jersey. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and slits in the sides.
Pre-tied bow tie in fabric with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width approx. 8 cm.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with a round neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with lightly padded cups and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a lace trim at the hem.
Shorts in a cotton weave. High, elasticated waist with ties, and frill-trimmed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, motif on the front and a rounded hem.
Alice band in glittery plastic with padded appliqués in the shape of ears and a unicorn horn on top.

Short jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets with a press-stud, and a drawstring hem. Lined.
Short velour top with a deep V-neck at the front, small collar that fastens at the back of the neck, an opening at the back and long sleeves.

Jacket in corduroy with a faux shearling-lined collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tab at the sides, and buttoned cuffs. Partly lined in faux shearling.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Double-knit jumper with a wide, lace-trimmed, ribbed V-neck. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with close-fitting, ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top and one inner compartment. Size 12x28x30 cm.
Sports jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and front pockets.

prod_name: Baby Lock Me Up Push Triangle
detail_desc: Triangle bikini top with frilled trims and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck with round, flat pendants.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft, printed jersey. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist and short ties at the front, and short legs.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Large earrings with metal discs partly covered in velvet. Length 7 cm.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button and press-studs at the crotch.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.
Short shorts in soft twill with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and has pleats and a sewn-on tie belt at the front. Pockets in the side seams.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. Wide, short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Short, patterned shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in softly draping jersey with a sheen. Narrow cut with draping and and an opening at the top, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck, and wide straps at the back. Lined.
Wide, straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with covered buttons at the front. Small stand-up collar, an opening and buttons at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in a crêpe weave with a concealed zip in the side and straight legs with creases.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with lace trims, short sleeves and a V-neck opening at the top with twisted ties. Unlined.

Short, straight-style dress in mesh. Round neckline with a small frilled collar, a smocked yoke at the front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Skirt with a seam at the hem, and overlocked edges around the collar and hem. Fitted inner dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Boxy, oversized jacket in cotton denim with a collar, metal buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a metal button and side pockets. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Knee-length dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with pleats at the top, and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a decorative metal buckle, a concealed zip in one side and a slit at the back.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with worn details, decorative sparkly stones around the pockets, a slit at the back and a raw-edge, uneven hem.
Double-breasted coat in woven fabric with a brushed finish. Notch lapels, welt side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.

prod_name: ED Make him pay for it PQ
detail_desc: Long cardigan knitted in a soft wool and alpaca blend with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Thin nylon socks in various designs.
Patterned swimsuit with a small stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the front, 3/4-length sleeves and short legs. Lined. UPF 50.

Ankle-length trousers in twill made from a cotton blend. High paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a zip fly and buttons, diagonal side pockets with a decorative flap and button, and tapered legs.
Opaque leggings with soft thermal fleece inside and elastication at the waist and hems.

Chiffon playsuit with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with flared flounces at the cuffs.
Short lace blouse with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Short, V-neck dress in stretch jersey with a wrapover front with ties at one side, and long sleeves.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. The tops of the thumb and index finger are in touchscreen-compatible material.
Long jumper in a soft, chunky knit with a ribbed stand-up collar, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted jacket in washed, stretch denim with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit linen with a slight sheen. V-neck, buttons down the front, and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft, felted fabric with decorative stitching, a high collar and concealed press-studs at the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist and front pockets. Lined.
Fully lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, straight-cut dress in satin with a stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and oversized, short sleeves. Long zip with long, narrow ties at the back. Cotton lining.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved, round-necked T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a frill-trimmed yoke, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist. V-cut at the front with crossover elastication at the waist.
Shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.
Block-heeled ankle boots with a zip on the inside. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim. Slightly looser fit with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy, and tapered legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline and ribbed trims.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy, patterned viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist and a fabric tie belt at the front. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Straight trousers in washed cotton twill with a soft brushed finish. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket, yoke with pleat at the back and ties at the hem.
Lined bandeau bikini top with padded cups with removable inserts, narrow tie-top shoulder straps, side support and straps that tie at the back.
